loginModal.title: Hey!
loginModal.paragraph: Log In or Sign Up to enroll to our loyalty program

enrollmentModal.alreadyEnrolledMessage: It looks like you're already a member of our Loyalty Program. No need to sign up again â€“ you're all set to keep enjoying your benefits and rewards. Thanks for being a loyal member!
enrollmentModal.successfullyEnrolledMessage: Welcome to our Loyalty Program! Your onboarding was successful. Get ready to enjoy exclusive rewards and special offers. We're excited to have you with us!
enrollmentModal.unsuccessfullyEnrolledMessage: We're sorry, but we couldn't complete your onboarding to our Loyalty Program. Please try again or reach out to our support team for help. We're eager to assist you!
